content.rendered:
Due to the city’s density and wide area, the rail network in London is a constant challenge. London’s east-west Crossrail network is one of Europe’s largest railway infrastructure projects.

Working with VINCI Construction UK, VINCI Construction Grands Projets and Bachy Soletanche Ltd were awarded the contract to build tunnels for the Liverpool Street and Whitechapel stations and related structures. They demolished and rebuilt the Whitechapel station and renovated the Tottenham Court Road and 13 other stations.

excerpt.rendered: The London underground system, one of the world’s largest, is expanding.
